citations.narrative:
The facility is not sampling for heartworm as prescribed in the Program of Veterinary Care (PVC). The PVC states
heartworm testing will be performed once a year. The last heartworm test was done on 1/16/24. There was no testing
done in 2025.
Failure to follow sampling requirements in the PVC can lead to failure to detect disease in the dogs.
The facility must follow the Program of Veterinary Care including sampling for parasites including heartworm.
Correct by: June 1, 2026
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the licensee.
n

narrative:
3.13(a)(3) 
   
Veterinary care for dogs. 
The facility is not sampling for heartworm as prescribed in the Program of Veterinary Care (PVC). The PVC states 
heartworm testing will be performed once a year. The last heartworm test was done on 1/16/24. There was no testing 
done in 2025. 
Failure to follow sampling requirements in the PVC can lead to failure to detect disease in the dogs. 
The facility must follow the Program of Veterinary Care including sampling for parasites including heartworm.  
Correct by: June 1, 2026 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the licensee. 
 
 n
